title: Agent Trace Log Schema
description: Schema for agent trace logs required by QUALITY_GATES.md

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of trace log creation

agent_id.description: Identifier for the agent generating the trace

task_id.description: Reference to the task or PR this trace relates to

actions.description: List of actions taken by the agent

filepath.description: File path affected by this action

reasoning.description: Brief explanation of why this action was taken

verification.description: Evidence of verification (commands run, outputs, test results)

reasoning_summary.description: High-level summary of reasoning for changes made

verification_evidence.description: Overall verification evidence (build output, test results, lint output)
